languages.text: {n}Облако нечестивого праха с силой вырывается из мешочка и устремляется к пси-удушителю. Окутав устройство вихрем бушующей скверны, частицы безжалостно вгрызаются в него. Паутина трещин покрывает поверхность парящего обелиска, после чего тот разлетается на куски. Вы слышите заливистый рыкающий смех, доносящийся отовсюду и изниоткуда — предвестник грядущей катастрофы, сотворенной вашими руками.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. A web of cracks spreads along the length of the hovering obelisk and, soon afterward, it shatters. You hear eager, snarling cackles coming from everywhere and nowhere at once — a portent of the oncoming calamity of your making.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. languages.text: {n}Un nuage de cendres maudites surgit du sac avant de fondre sur le carcan psychique. Elle forme une tempête de corruption qui engloutit l'appareil suspendu en l'air, grignotant sa structure sans relâche. Des craquelures apparaissent à la surface de l'obélisque qui vole bientôt en éclats. Tels des présages de la calamité à venir, vous percevez des gloussements impatients, qui semblent venir de partout et nulle part à la fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. A web of cracks spreads along the length of the hovering obelisk and, soon afterward, it shatters. languages.text: {n}一团邪恶的灰烬从袋子喷射出来，冲向了竞技场的灵能抑制装置。魔尘在设备周围形成了一场腐化的风暴，无情地侵蚀着它的外壳。悬在空中的方尖碑周围出现了蜘蛛网状的裂痕，没过多久，方尖碑便裂成了碎块。随后，你听到急切的咆哮声与笑声猛然从四面八方传来——你一手制造的灾难即将来临。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. A web of cracks spreads along the length of the hovering obelisk and, soon afterward, it shatters. You hear eager, snarling cackles coming from everywhere and nowhere at once — a portent of the oncoming calamity of your making.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一团邪恶的灰烬从袋子喷射出来，冲向了竞技场的灵能抑制装置。魔尘在设备周围形成了一场腐化的风暴，无情地侵蚀着它的外壳。悬在空中的方尖碑周围出现了蜘蛛网状的裂痕，没过多久，方尖碑便裂成了碎块。随后，你听到急切的咆哮声与笑声猛然从四面八方传来——你一手制造的灾难即将来临。{/n}

languages.text: {n}不浄の灰の雲が袋から噴き出し、サイ・スティフラーに猛スピードで向かっていった。粉塵は装置の周囲で腐敗の嵐を巻き起こし、容赦なくその骨組みを食い荒らしていく。空中に浮かぶオベリスクの長さに沿って亀裂が広がり、やがて粉々に砕け散った。どこからともなく、熱のこもった怒号のような笑い声が聞こえてくる。それはあなたがもたらした、迫りくる災難の前兆だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. A web of cracks spreads along the length of the hovering obelisk and, soon afterward, it shatters. You hear eager, snarling cackles coming from everywhere and nowhere at once — a portent of the oncoming calamity of your making.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不浄の灰の雲が袋から噴き出し、サイ・スティフラーに猛スピードで向かっていった。粉塵は装置の周囲で腐敗の嵐を巻き起こし、容赦なくその骨組みを食い荒らしていく。空中に浮かぶオベリスクの長さに沿って亀裂が広がり、やがて粉々に砕け散った。どこからともなく、熱のこもった怒号のような笑い声が聞こえてくる。それはあなたがもたらした、迫りくる災難の前兆だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Wolke unheiliger Asche zischt aus dem Beutel und rast in Richtung des Psi-Unterdrückers. Der Staub umhüllt das Gerät in einem Sturm der Verderbnis und frisst sich unerbittlich durch dessen Rahmen. Zahlreiche Risse ziehen sich durch den schwebenden Obelisken und dann zerbricht er. Du hörst begieriges, knurrendes Gelächter, das von überall und nirgends gleichzeitig zu kommen scheint – ein Omen der bevorstehenden Katastrophe, für die du selbst gesorgt hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. A web of cracks spreads along the length of the hovering obelisk and, soon afterward, it shatters. You hear eager, snarling cackles coming from everywhere and nowhere at once — a portent of the oncoming calamity of your making.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una nube de cenizas impías sale disparada de la bolsa y vuela directamente hacia el supresor psíquico. El polvo forma un torbellino de corrupción en torno al dispositivo que horada implacablemente su carcasa. La superficie del obelisco flotante se resquebraja, y poco después estalla en pedazos. Oyes una risotada ronca que procede de todas partes y ninguna a la vez, un augurio de la inminente calamidad que has desatado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cloud of unholy ashes shoots out of the bag and barrels toward the psy-stifler. The dust forms a tempest of corruption around the device, relentlessly chewing through its frame. A web of cracks spreads along the length of the hovering obelisk and, soon afterward, it shatters. You hear eager, snarling cackles coming from everywhere and nowhere at once — a portent of the oncoming calamity of your making.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uğursuz küllerin meydana getirdiği bulut, kesenin içinden fırladığı gibi ruhboğana hücum ediyor. Toz, cihazın çevresinde yozlaştırıcı bir fırtına misali dolanıyor, kasasını çiğniyor. Süzülen dikili taşta, boylu boyunca ağı andıran çatlaklar oluşuyor. Taş çok geçmeden parçalanıyor. Aynı anda her yerden ve hiçbir yerden geliyor gibi yankılanan hasmane kıkırtılar duyuyorsun. Senin marifetin olan bir felaketin ön gösterimi bu.{/n}
